content: *spider web the small alternating shell pattern in this shoulder wrap looks like vintage lace made of lightweight microfiber yarn the wrap is not only ultra soft and feminine but also warm copyrighted materials from the book hooked throws used with permission from creative publishing international lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # hookedthrows corrections applied jul 18 2007 skill level advanced beginner microspun article #910 8 balls crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge 4 shell clusters = 4 10 cm wrap is worked in one piece to create the staggered placement of shells from row to row odd row begin and end with a half cluster cluster even row begin and end with a full cluster worked in 2-row pattern finish with border
